title: Resort Inspired Living Every Day
posting_body: ['Mediterranean Village is located in West Hollywood in close proximity to all of the exciting spots such as: museums on Miracle Mile, Upscale shopping in Beverly Hills and nightlife at both the Sunset Strip and West Hollywood.', 'Elegant fountains and Mediterranean landscaping create a relaxing living environment with short-term leasing available.', '- Courtyard setting with tropical landscape, fountains, and koi pond', '- Heated resort-style pool', '- 24-Hour fitness center', '- 24-Hour laundry centers', '- Elevator access', '- Gas included', '- Cable and high-speed internet available', '- Walking distance to Melrose Avenue shopping district', '- Walking distance to the Beverly Center', '- Walking distance to Santa Monica and Sunset Boulevard’s dining and grocery shopping', '- 2 miles from The Grove and The Farmers Market', '- Steps to public transportation', '- Conveniently located to the 405, 10, and 101 freeways', '- Gated property access', '- Assigned covered parking', '- On-site management available 7 days a week', '- 24-Hour emergency on-call maintenance', '- Nightly courtesy patrol', '- Full stainless-steel appliance package with gas range', '- Plank flooring', '- Mirrored closets', '- Granite countertops', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '*On select units and new move-ins only.', 'Pricing is subject to change.', 'Restrictions apply.', 'Call for details.']
